basics.name: Alexander (Sandy) McFadden
basics.label: Senior Software Developer / Technical Support Engineer
basics.summary: A senior software developer and technical support engineer with extensive experience building scalable applications and troubleshooting complex systems. Recognized for quickly diagnosing and resolving technical issues, creating comprehensive documentation, and building internal tools that improve workflows. Combines deep technical knowledge with strong communication skills, systematic problem-solving, and a collaborative approach. Passionate about helping customers succeed while mentoring teams and partnering effectively across engineering and product departments.

- Created predictable, ordered processing rules to prevent conflicts and improve routing accuracy
- Reduced API usage by batching updates after all rules were processed
- Improved support team efficiency by ensuring all triaging tasks completed before assignment
Maintained and enhanced internal support tools used by global support teams

highlights: Implemented crypto library for content encryption and decryption
Designed high-performance client-side search system

work.name: Automattic
work.summary: Full-stack development across web client, Electron desktop app, and backend (Google App Engine).

Designed and implemented an API endpoint and coordinated integration efforts with each client team. Successfully met the app store deadline, avoiding disruption to primary user acquisition channels.
Implemented a localization system for emails and initial welcome note ensuring 360,000 monthly active users received correspondence in their preferred language

Fixed critical security issues

work.name: Automattic
work.summary: Delivered high-impact technical support for WordPress.com and Automattic products, excelling in complex troubleshooting, customer education, and process improvement. Consistently ranked among the top performers for support volume and quality. Promoted to Lead in 2016, where I drove operational excellence, team development, and innovative support initiatives to elevate both customer and team outcomes.

Helped implement scheduling and forecasting processes to optimize staffing, meet service goals, and proactively address support demand fluctuations
Led and supported a team of Happiness Engineers through feedback, coaching, and performance evaluation, with a focus on growth and high-quality support
Escalated critical issues to engineering teams with detailed reproduction steps and impact analysis, driving product improvements
Analyzed support trends to identify training needs and inform product enhancements
